mosinstall.name: DBQuery
mosinstall.author: Green Mountain Information Technology Consulting
mosinstall.copyright: This component is released under the GNU/GPL License
mosinstall.description: Database Query is a Joomla query manager.

param.name: qname
param.label: DBQ Query Name
param.description: Run a specific query, used for preparing or executing a query

param.name: qid
param.label: DBQ Query ID
param.description: Run a specific query, used for preparing or executing a query

param.name: category
param.label: DBQ Category ID or Name
param.description: List the available queries in the specified category, used when selecting a query

param.name: template
param.label: DBQ Template Name
param.description: Load a specific query, used when selecting a query

queries.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__dbquery` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `name` varchar(64) NOT NULL default '', `display_name` varchar(64) NOT NULL default '', `db_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `sql` text NOT NULL, `catid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `template` varchar(32) NOT NULL default 'default', `expect_rows` tinyint(1) default '1', `page_navigation` tinyint(1) default '0', `rotate_results` tinyint(1) default '0', `display_regex` varchar(32) NOT NULL default '', `stats` tinyint(1) default '0', `count_sql` varchar(32) NOT NULL default '0', `access` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `published` tinyint(1) default '0', `ordering` int(11) unsigned default '0', `archived` tinyint(1) default '0', `debug` tinyint(1) default '0', `uses_vars` tinyint(1) default '0', `hits` int(11) unsigned default '0', `description` text NOT NULL, `comment` varchar(250) default NULL, `checked_out` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `checked_out_time` datetime default NULL, `parse` text, `contacts_id` int(11) default NULL, `params` text, `use_confirmation` tinyint(1) default '0', `use_notification` tinyint(1) default '0', `notification_emails` text, `notification_subject` varchar(250) default NULL, `notification_message` text, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `name` (`name`), KEY `dbid` (`db_id`) )

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__dbquery_config` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `name` varchar(64) NOT NULL default '', `type` varchar(32) NOT NULL default '', `key` varchar(32) NOT NULL default '', `value` varchar(128) NOT NULL default '', `ordering` int(11) unsigned default '0', `description` text, `comment` varchar(100) default '', `checked_out` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `checked_out_time` datetime default NULL, `params` text, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) )

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__dbquery_databases` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `name` varchar(64) NOT NULL default '', `type` varchar(32) NOT NULL default '', `driver` varchar(32) NOT NULL default '', `persistent` tinyint(1) default '1', `debug` tinyint(1) default '0', `hostname` varchar(64) NOT NULL default '', `schemaname` varchar(48) NOT NULL default '', `username` varchar(48) default '', `password` varchar(48) default '', `on_line` tinyint(1) default '0', `ordering` int(11) unsigned default '0', `archived` tinyint(1) default '0', `description` text, `comment` varchar(200) default NULL, `checked_out` int(11) unsigned default '0', `checked_out_time` datetime default NULL, `params` text, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) )

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__dbquery_errors` ( `source` varchar(64) default NULL, `oid` int(11) default NULL, `oname` varchar(255) default NULL, `uid` int(11) default '0', `priority` int(2) default NULL, `date_reported` timestamp NOT NULL, `message` text, KEY `source_idx` (`source`), KEY `oname_idx` (`oname`) )

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__dbquery_stats` ( `query_id` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `variable_id` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `value` text NOT NULL, `date_queried` timestamp NOT NULL, KEY `qid` (`query_id`), KEY `vid` (`variable_id`) )

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__dbquery_substitutions` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `variable_id` int(11) default NULL, `value` varchar(64) NOT NULL default '', `label` varchar(64) NOT NULL default '', `ordering` int(11) unsigned default '0', `checked_out` int(11) unsigned default '0', `checked_out_time` datetime default NULL, `default` tinyint(1) default NULL, `params` text, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `vid` (`variable_id`) )

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__dbquery_variables` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `query_id` int(11) default '0', `display_name` varchar(64) NOT NULL default '', `name` varchar(64) NOT NULL default '', `type` varchar(16) NOT NULL default '', `input` varchar(16) default NULL, `regex` varchar(16) default NULL, `size` int(6) default '16', `required` varchar(16) default NULL, `active` tinyint(1) default '0', `uses_custom_query` tinyint(1) default '0', `ordering` int(11) unsigned default '0', `debug` tinyint(1) unsigned default '0', `description` text NOT NULL, `checked_out` int(11) unsigned default '0', `checked_out_time` datetime default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `stats` tinyint(1) default '1', `default_value` text, `page` int(3) default NULL, `code` text, `params` text, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `qid` (`query_id`) )
